experiences: Collaborated closely with 2 Meta Engineers and 12 fellows to build individual projects focusing on software engineering principles such as unit testing, scripting, containers, continuous integration, and troubleshooting.
Facilitated knowledge sharing by leading weekly code reviews and feedback sessions, improving code quality and team efficiency, and driving continuous improvement across the team.

Refactored a tool that allowed for the addition of notes to a set of source code differences, enabling analysts to add commentary on specific changes without modifying either version of the code being compared.

Finetuned a large language model (LLM) that could scan and sort project reports based on relevance to sponsor interest and problem space, speeding up the manual review process by 80% and allowing for 500+ projects to be reviewed simultaneously.
Increased productivity by assisting a health center of over 100 employees with hardware and software-related issues.
Ensured seamless operation of 18 software applications crucial to the health center's operations.
